meanings.definition: A person or company that enters into a contract with a main contractor to perform a specific task or job.
meanings.sent1: The subcontractors completed the painting job on time.
meanings.sent2: The main contractor hired subcontractors to help with the construction project.
meanings.sent3: The subcontractors joked about their paintbrushes having a mind of their own.
meanings.sent4: The subcontractors were the artists adding color to the canvas of the building.
meanings.sent5: The subcontractors were like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly into the project.

meanings.definition: To engage a subcontractor to carry out work on behalf of a main contractor.
meanings.sent1: The company subcontractors the plumbing work to specialists.
meanings.sent2: He subcontractors the electrical installations to ensure safety.
meanings.sent3: She subcontractors the cleaning duties to keep the office sparkling.
meanings.sent4: They subcontractors the landscaping tasks to maintain the property.
meanings.sent5: The manager subcontractors the maintenance tasks to different teams.
